footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Playstyle: Raiden Shogun

description:
Raiden's Elemental Skill (E) buffs all elemental bursts emitted from other characters in your party, therefore, it is recommended that you use Raiden in the following sequence:

> Use Raiden's Elemental Skill (E)
> Swap out your Raiden, and start using all available Elemental Bursts (Q) from your other characters with this additional buff activated.
> Once you have use all your Elemental Bursts, you may swap back to your Raiden and use her Elemental Burst (Q) as well.
> **Repeat.**
title: Raiden Shogun | Playstyle
